programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Superscopes
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Superscopes, S02E02, The human eye can only see visible light, a small spectrum of electromagnetic waves. Today, we have instruments that let us perceive all wavelengths.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Vesta Unveiled
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Vesta Unveiled, S03E02, With the Dawn missions exploration of the asteroid Vesta and the dwarf planet Ceres, asteroids are a hot topic. See what these incredible missions have uncovered.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Cosmic Rays
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rays, S04E04, Cosmic rays can tell us much about the universe. They are not simply another form of light, but carriers of information about powerful and unseen processes at work thousands or even millions of light years away.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

This episode also looks at recent missions, including the Herschel Space Observatory's examination of the Milky Wa

In the Shadow of the Moon, 20070101080000 +0000, Between 1968 and 1972, the world watched in awe each time an American spacecraft voyaged to the Moon. Only 12 men walked upon its surface and they remain the only human beings to have stood on another world.

programme.title: Dark Angel

programme.title: A Family Cursed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E09, One family faces two unsolved murders of their loved ones. It takes thirteen years for detectives to uncover the one missing clue that can lead them to the killer: the hidden crime scene.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E15, Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E07, A woman's fall from a cliff in the Grand Canyon leads police to uncover a series of grisly murders, and investigators smoke out a killer when they find crucial DNA evidence on his cigarette butts.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2011, A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: The Burning Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E12, A detective keeps a murder investigation going for 16 years and finally proves a woman killed her husband in a satanic rite; THE BURNING SECRET: and a rape victim fails to get a conviction on her attacker.

programme.title: Sisters In Death
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E17, March 1984. Jack Kennedy discovers his daughters brutally murdered. Their mother and niece spend their lives keeping the case alive. DNA leads nowhere. 30 years later, an informant gives up a name.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part One
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunites in Chesapeake Shores for the first time in years.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part Two
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunion weekend continues.

programme.title: We're Not Losing a Son
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Abby settles in and starts her job at her firm's Baltimore office.

programme.title: We're Gaining a Daughter
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. As Kevin remains missing, the O'Brien family nervously wait for news.

programme.title: The Fifth Race
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E15, While studying alien wall inscriptions on another planet, O'Neill peers into a viewer that unleashes ancient knowledge into his mind like computer virus. Can the SG-1 team reverse the process before his mind is completely reconfigured.

programme.title: A Matter Of Time
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E16, A black hole swallows the SG-10 team, and O'Neill is sent on a rescue mission. As the hole's pull grows stronger, it draws the Stargate toward it and soon threatens to destroy Earth. Will O'Neill find a way to stop this super-destructive force?

programme.title: Holiday
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E17, Jackson's body is swapped with that of an old Goa'uld enemy. As Jackson lies dying in the alien's ancient body, O'Neill and Teal'c accidentally switch forms too, and unless the alien is captured, all will be trapped in their new bodies forever!

programme.title: Serpent's Song
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E18, SG-1's arch-enemy Apophis is dying and seeks sanctuary with O'Neill. But what he really wants is a new host in exchange for his knowledge of the Goa'uld. Will O'Neill grant his request or send him back to the Goa'uld to face his fate?

programme.title: One False Step
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E19, On a routine recon mission, the SG-1 team discovers a new, friendly life form. But the encounter turns deadly for the new race because of a virus SG-1 inadvertently introduces. Can SG-1 develop a vaccine before this plague eradicates a civilization?

programme.title: Show And Tell
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E20, A boy mysteriously appears at SGC and pleas for help, claiming the Goa'uld are chasing him to find a race of invisible beings. But the SG-1 team doesn't know that the invisible aliens plan to destroy humanity…and their invasion has already begun!

Stargate SG-1, S02E21, A solar flare sends the SG-1 team back to 1969, where the U.S. military suspects the team of espionage. O'Neill and his team escape with two Woodstock-bound kids, desperate to find the Stargate before they're stuck in the psychedelic past forever.

programme.title: The Prodigal
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E14, Atlantis is suddenly plunged into darkness, with only the top tier of the central tower unaffected. As Sheppard and McKay attempt to get to the top level, they discover that a force field has been established to prevent them from gaining access.

programme.title: Remnants
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E15, While Richard Woolsey (Robert Picardo) struggles to keep his position as the leader of Atlantis, and McKay (David Hewlett) and Zelenka (David Nykl) investigate a mysterious find, Sheppard is captured by an old enemy with plans to invade the city.

programme.title: Brain Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E16, When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: Infection
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E17, The team prepares for the worst as board a Wraith hive ship over Atlantis. They're surprised to find the Wraith crew in stasis when a malfunction on the hive ship releases the remaining crew… who have been cannibalizing one another for food.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E18, When Dr. Jennifer Keller is observed behaving very strangely, extensive testing reveals nothing abnormal. But McKay’s investigation leads him to suspect that Dr. Keller and Neela Casol, a notorious criminal, have switched consciousnesses.

programme.title: Vegas
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E19, In an alternate universe, Detective John Sheppard is with the Las Vegas Police Department and begins to investigate a strange series of murders believed to be the work of a bizarre serial killer. Has life changed or is this a dangerous Wraith plot?

programme.title: Enemy At The Gate
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E20, Puzzled over the hive ship's sudden departure, the team picks up a weak subspace signal in Wraith code. Once deciphered, their worst fears are realized. The Wraith message contains a familiar set of coordinates. The hive ship is on its way to Earth!

programme.title: Rising (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E01, A new Stargate team, lead by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy , where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy that feeds on human fear. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Cloverdale
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E05, While exploring a new planet, Lt. Scott is attacked by an aggressive plant-like creature that infects him. Scott's circumstances turn dire and Tamara must search for a way to stop the alien infection from spreading while more creatures move in.

programme.title: Trial And Error

Mommy's Little Girl, 20250509012400 +0000, Raised in lonely isolation by her controlling grandparents, Sadie is finally reunited with her mother. Obsessed with protecting her newfound happiness, Sadie refuses to let anyone threaten her new life.

Beyond the Headlines: Escaping the NXIVM Cult With Gretchen Carlson, 20250509030800 +0000, The purported self-help group NXIVM traps thousands and targets the minds and bodies of young women from around the country; actress Catherine Oxenberg shares her personal fight to get her daughter out of the outrageous cult.

You Killed My Mother, 20250509040000 +0000, After being told her mother doesn't qualify for a liver transplant, a disturbed teen attacks and injures a hospital nurse. When she's released from a mental hospital years later, she seeks revenge on those she blames for her mother's death.
Beware of Mom, 20250509054100 +0000, A woman tries to save her teenage daughter from a wild neighborhood mother who wants to steal her away.

Mother of All Lies, 20250509072300 +0000, After Sara helps Abby, her birth mother, get released from prison, she finds herself in danger when Abby reconnects with her old partner. When he ends up dead, both Abby and Sara are hunted by the police and the dead man's partners.

Beyond the Headlines: The Watts Family Tragedy, 20250509090800 +0000, A deeper look into the circumstances surrounding the Chris Watts murder case includes never-before-seen footage and new interviews with Tammy Lee, the agent with the Colorado Bureau of Investigation who elicited Watt's confession.

programme.title: Father Faust
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E14, Baywatch faces two bizarre lawsuits. Kekoa’s father wants her to break up with JD and quit lifeguarding. Zack runs the new Junior Lifeguards program. A government Investigation puts Sean’s job and the future of the Training Center in jeopardy.

programme.title: Good Man in a Storm
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E15, A hurricane hits Hawaii. Sean and Jenna get trapped in a WWII bunker and must put their hatred aside and work together to escape. Zack is trapped in headquarters with a thrill-seeking reporter that puts their lives in danger to get her story.

programme.title: My Father the Hero
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E16, Jenna invests all her money with an investment banker who turns out to be a con man. Derek Hart is the kind of man JD wishes he was. But when Derek jumps off a cliff, JD and Jason dive in to save his life, in more ways than one!

programme.title: Boiling Point
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E17, Zack corrupts the headquarters’ computer system forcing everyone to work in the Dark Ages. Sean is freaked because a major donor is about to arrive in the midst of chaos. Jason saves Brit from her ex.

programme.title: The Return of Jessie
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E18, Kekoa is devastated when Jessie tells JD that he’s the father of her child. A rescued bodyboarder is paralyzed. Sean has a romantic encounter with a beautiful, woman he thinks might really be Pele, the goddess fire.

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E19, Investigating toxic dumping, Sean and Leigh end up chained inside a chamber slowly filling with toxic seawater. Can Sam get them out in time? To raise money, Jason and Zack have to hula dance in grass skirts in front of a lot of women.

programme.title: Dead Reckoning
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E20, Leigh takes over at Baywatch while Sean, Jason, and Zack go to compete in a 12-mile race of natural obstacles. Jessie’s presence at the race creates turmoil. Leigh and Jenna pretend to be lesbian lovers.

programme.title: Makapu'u Lighthouse
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E21, For a rescue, Sean is awarded a free week at Hilton Hawaiian Village, which he declines. Zack pretends he’s Sean and enjoys all the freebies until Sean shows up! A pretty fashion photographer thinks Jason has top model potential.

programme.title: Rescue Me
programme.desc: Baywatch Hawaii, S11E22, Sean has a decision – move to Australia or stay in Hawaii. Zack sees Leigh naked, leading to complications with her fiancé Sam. Kekoa dumps JD and becomes a party girl. When Sam leaves Leigh at the altar, Sean asks Leigh to marry him instead.

programme.title: Panic at Malibu Pier
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E01, Craig rescues a woman that develops a fatal attraction to him, placing Craig's wife in mortal danger. A fishing trip goes horribly wrong when the boat explodes and Mitch and his mentor Al have to rescue its passengers, including Mitch’s son Hobie.

programme.title: In Deep
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E02, Playing hooky from summer school, Lt. Mitch Buchannon's son Hobie gets dangerously involved with reckless jet skiers.

programme.title: Heat Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E03, During the hottest day of the summer, Craig has to choose between his career as a lawyer and the job he loves being a Baywatch lifeguard. The choice is made when two boys get trapped in a storm drain which is rapidly filling with water.

programme.title: The Second Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E04, Eddie must come to terms with his past when he confronts a gang of "surf rats" lead by a former friend from his reform school days. Trevor begins to doubt his lifeguarding skill when his girlfriend almost drowns because of his arrogance.

programme.title: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E05, Hobie overhears his divorcing parents arguing and boats away to a deserted island with two friends, only to have their boat drift away, leaving them stranded on the island with modern day pirates!

programme.title: The Sky is Falling
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E06, After their plane crashes, two robbers attempt to retrieve their suitcase full of stolen money from the ocean. Meanwhile, Mitch and Gayle go to court over custody of Hobie.

programme.title: The Drowning Pool
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E07, A wealthy older man drowns under suspicious circumstances in front of Jill Riley's tower. Jill endures the pain of losing her first victim, becoming obsessed with unraveling whether his death was an accidental drowning or murder.
